text:
I saved a model with @save like so:
`julia> @save "count_ones_model.bson" model`
Now when I try to load it back in I get:
`julia> @load "count_ones_model.bson" mymod`
ERROR: KeyError: key :mymod not found
Stacktrace:
 [1] getindex(::Dict{Symbol,Any}, ::Symbol) at ./dict.jl:467
 [2] top-level scope at /home/phil/.julia/packages/BSON/XAts7/src/BSON.jl:53

text: I think BSON expects the thing you load into to be the same symbol name? As in `model` not `mymod`

text: Oh, ok, yes that works. Thanks.
